This appropriation is intended to cover property investments and fitting-out work carried out by the institution. The European Parliament’s Bureau is requested to adopt a coherent and responsible long-term strategy in the area of property and buildings which takes into account the particular problem of increasing maintenance costs
nmc-article: renovation needs and security costs and ensures the sustainability of the European Parliament’s budget.
